=== Raw music files ===
{{IN|je}}, the music files can be found in {{code|[[.minecraft]]/assets/objects}}.{{fn|The files in the <samp>objects</samp> folder are hashed. To locate the music files, see [[Tutorial:Sound directory]].}}

{{IN|be}} and ''[[Minecraft Education]]'', it can be found in:

* Mobile: {{code|[[com.mojang]]/resource_packs/music/vanilla_music/sounds/music/game/}}
* Windows: {{code|%PROGRAMFILES%\WindowsApps\Microsoft.MinecraftUWP_''<version>''_x64_8wekyb3d8bbwe\data\resource_packs\vanilla_music\sounds\music\game}}

All music files are in {{w|Vorbis|Ogg Vorbis}}.

==Trivia==
* "Bromeliad" refers to a [[wikipedia:Bromeliaceae|taxonomic family]] of flowering plants. This family contains a few [[pitcher plant]]s, as well as several species which resemble [[torchflower]]s.
* This leitmotif was used in [[Watcher]]
